string.text: Find %s for Petrovich
You need to bring tools to Petrovich so that he can upgrade the equipment.

You know, buddy, I'm actually a pretty good technician. I can fix both weapons and armor, and even do some upgrades! Well, I would if the tools were decent. But where can you get them around here? Maybe you could help me get a basic set, huh?
I need a set of tools for rough work. It should have tools and oils for working with weapons. If you can get it, I'll be grateful and even pay you!.. Probably.
Great, man! Oh, sorry, I don't have anything to pay you with. But I can give you a good discount!
Find %s for Petrovich
You need to bring Petrovich tools for delicate work. He needs a more complete set to perform more complex upgrades on equipment.
Hey man, if you agree to get me a more complete set, I'll give you an even bigger discount. Will you help me out, friend?
I need tools for delicate work. It should have everything I need. You'll be like a brother to me if you get it for me!

Wow, thanks a lot, buddy! Now I'm definitely going to get rich. Damn, I'm going to be successful!.. If, of course, I don't miss this chance. But for now, I can't offer you anything better than a discount. Sorry, pal.
